snippet: ANGELO--John. We mourn the death of our pal John Angelo, whose energy, confidence and love of life inspired everyone he knew. Our family's sympathies go to his devoted wife Judy and their children Kate, Jack and Jesse. Susan and Peter Solomon and Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John. We mourn the death of our pal John Angelo, whose energy, confidence and love of life inspired everyone he knew. Our family's sympathies go to his devoted wife Judy and their children Kate, Jack and Jesse. Susan and Peter Solomon and Family 1/3
